recipe: Hold at cislunar staging; wait for next phase cap (|phase−φ_opt|≤2°).
Commit {4} TMI at that cap; resequence manifest if necessary.
If ≤4°, commit at next cap; else add <=2 micro {2} trims pre-TMI, then commit.
At ~30% and ~70% of tT, apply {2} trims to recover Δv deficit; escalate to {4} if >40 m/s total.
Apply retro {2} trims at next cap; if overshoot >5%, single {4} braking correction.
Three-cap sequence: along-track, cross-track, along-track; ≤20 m/s each.
If captured: {4} circularize next periapsis; if not: two-pass capture with periapsis {4} burns.
Raise periapsis via {2}; stabilize with {8}; finalize with small {4}.
